comments.author: @kristoawesome
comments.text: I know this is for smaller YouTubers (including me with 2 subs) but When I watched Motivation for Small YouTubers #2, I felt like I could accomplish anything. For example, I was doubted I would never make my little league baseball's All Star team. After almost a month of work and effort, I got all 100 percents in each category of tests to get on the team. I was able to get to the Regional Championship and I got that far. After that, I joined a select baseball team and had one of the states most highest strikeout percentages in my city. I hope one person takes the time to read this. And achieving something only takes time. No matter how long it takes, you will achieve your dream. Even if your dream takes a lifetime, it will come true if you put the effort in.
